title: White Chocolate Christmas Peppermint Bark
directions: Spread saltines out on parchment paper.
Using a double boiler, melt white chocolate chips, adding oil as it begins to melt to prevent clumping.
When chocolate is melted, pour over saltines. Spread if needed to cover them all.
Pour andes baking chips over melted chocolate.
Optional- sprinkle sea salt over candy.
ingredients: Sea salt, 2 generous pinches, optional (if you like it a touch saltier)
